features_h:
The Fastest Digital Currency
for Your Future money
features_p1: Developed using the same technology stack as EOS or BitShares, based on well tested Graphene framework.
features_p2: Lampgram strives to solve blockchain governance, workflow transparency issues.
features_p3: In Lampgram, the transparency brings trust & strong reliability.
features2_h2_1: Delegated Proof Of Stake is our focus.
features2_p1: You must make sure that your investment brings you power & money! We do not allow issues on our network. The development team is wholly committed to keeping it the project up to date.
features2_p2: Money should be fair and easy! Your keys - your wallet, we are running completely on our own decentralized blockchain providing all of the security keys to the owners of the wallets.
features2_p3: Make sure that all of your coins are in a secure place that is why we provide the ease of holding your own keys & credentials in the digital wallet along with the support of native hardware devices.
coin_sale_p_1: ICO Lampgram coin will be released on the basis of the own blockchain platform. It’s compatibility of the coin with third-party services wallets, exchanges, etc. Striving to provide the easy-to-use decentralized platform.
stage1_bonus_p: 50%, 40%, 30%, 20% determined by whitelist positions. Extra 5% bonus for individual purchases greater than $10,000.
coin_sale_p_2: Launch of the coin sale for major investors with the entry threshold of $10 000
road_map_p: A decentralized, distributed Blockchain system providing businesses opportunities & innovations. The platform for big corporations, medium-small businesses, individuals.
dont_miss_mobile_p: A Mobile App for Quicker Access.
dont_miss_mobile_h6: Now you can control the dashboard from the mobile!
dont_miss_mobile_p2: Buy, sell, transfer your coins right from your pocket! Manage your workflow at one handover!
bragging: We Strive to be The Fastest Growing Global Network.
bragging_p: We're are aiming for the fastest growing digital network that has a strong community & great security. Check out our info goals with several numbers.
solutions_all_p: We put your ideas and your wishes in the form of a unique project that inspires you and us. Lampgram Store in the other way helps you to bring the new tech solutions.
lampgram_store_desc: AI powered store of prefabs and solutions
get_in_touch_desc: Are you interested in collaboration? Do you belong to press? Or want to submit a quote request?
